bill_title: to provide for the appointment process for the secretary of the Department of Tribal Relations.

bill_versions.bill_text: A JOINT RESOLUTION, to provide for the appointment process for the secretary of the Department of Tribal Relations. BE IT RESOLVED BY THE SENATE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA, THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES CONCURRING THEREIN: Section 1. That at the next general election held in the state, the following amendment to Article IV of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota, as set forth in section 2 of this Joint Resolution, which is hereby agreed to, shall be submitted to the electors of the state for approval. Section 2. That Article IV of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota, be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read as follows: § 14. The Governor shall appoint a secretary of the Department of Tribal Relations from a list of names submitted from each of the nine federally recognized Indian tribes in the state. An appointment shall be subject to the advice and consent of a majority of the tribal chairmen and presidents of each of the nine federally recognized Indian tribes. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
